China Water Risk (Chinese simplified: 中国水危机; Chinese traditional: 中國水危機) bụ atụmatụ na-enweghị uru nke dị na Hong Kong raara onwe ya nye ịkọwapụta na idozi azụmahịa na ihe ize ndụ gburugburu ebe obibi nke sitere na  mba ahụ

Ebumnuche ya kwuru bụ "ịkwalite ojiji dị irè na nke ọma nke akụ mmiri nke People's Republic of China site na itinye ego zuru ụwa ọnụ na obodo azụmahịa, obodo na ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu na nghọta na ijikwa ihe ize ndụ mmiri nke China. Ebe ozi ya www.chinawaterrisk.org na-enye ikpo okwu iji kesaa echiche ndị ọkachamara, nyocha, ajụjụ ọnụ na nyocha site n'aka ndị isi ụlọ ọrụ

Ndị ọrụ nwere ike ịnweta ozi kachasị mkpa na nke dị oke mkpa iji nyere aka mee mkpebi itinye ego na-enweghị isi yana ịnọgide na-enwe ohere itinye ego na gburugburu ebe na-agbanwe agbanwe. A na-ekwukarị ihe ize ndụ mmiri China site na akụkọ azụmahịa na ụlọ ọrụ ma na-ekwu okwu, na-ekere òkè na mkparịta ụka panel ma na-agafeghị oke na ndị ọchụnta ego dị iche iche na nnọkọ azụmahịa na  ogbako.
China Water Risk na-enweta ego site na Hong Kong-based ADM Capital Foundation (US 501(c)(3) ọnọdụ ọrụ ebere na ụlọ ọrụ ọrụ ọrụ ebere edebanyere aha n'okpuru Sec
88 nke IRD na Hong Kong) ADM Capital ntọala guzobere na afọ 2006 site na Asia Debt Management Hong Kong Limited (ADM Capital).

Omume a mepụtara na mmekorita ya n'oge ọ na-anwale ya dị ka The Asia Water Project, na Civic Exchange, Association for Social and Responsible Investing in Asia (ASrIA), Business for Social Responsibility (BSR), Institute of Public and Environmental Affairs (IPE), na Responsible Research.  A gbanwere aha ya ka ọ bụrụ China Water Risk na afọ 2010 na ebe nrụọrụ weebụ ya www.chinawaterrisk.org meghere maka ọha na eze na ọnwa October 27, afọ 2011.
China Water Risk na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ mmiri, ndị ọkachamara itinye ego na ndị NGO na-eche echiche na azụmahịa / ndị ọchụnta ego chụpụrụ iji wetara ọha na eze ozi ọhụrụ banyere mmiri na China
